solution_line_template: He uses {wipes_per_day} wipes a day and the pack of baby wipes come {wipes_per_pack} wipes per pack so they will last {wipes_per_pack}/{wipes_per_day} = {days_per_pack} days

He needs enough to last for {total_days_needed} days and 1 pack will last {days_per_pack} days so he needs {total_days_needed}/{days_per_pack} = <<{total_days_needed}/{days_per_pack}={packs_needed}>>{packs_needed} packs
